title: Whole Foods Market UK
description: Get hungry for local, organic, plant-based & more. Browse products, find recipes. Get delivery, pick up & order catering.
cleaned_text: Better Beauty Swap. We want to encourage you to make clean beauty swaps to your routine, so between 20th September and 3rd October 2023 we'll be offering you 25% off your entire skin, face and body care shop if you bring your conventional beauty product in store (empty or full)*. Find out more information below. *Terms and conditions apply. Enjoy low prices. Same high quality Our range of choices, with high-quality ingredients at prices you can get down with, makes shopping so much more than tossing the basics in your bag. Discover more low prices in store now (you're gonna need a bigger basket). Order pizzas, salads and more favourites. Choose from hundreds of our favourite products and get them delivered to your door in a flash with Deliveroo. Discover Our Latest & Greatest Check out what's hot right now, including limited-time-only savings, finds and seasonal favourites. Philadelphia Original Soft Cheese Rowse Natural Blossom Honey Squeezy The Coconut Collab Natural Coconut Yoghurt Yorkshire Red Label Tea Bags FAGE Total Greek Yoghurt 5% 20% off* NuGo Organic Dark Chocolate Bar Range Dark Chocolate Gummies 20% Blend Capsules 20% off* Kiki Health Organic Sea Moss Capsules Dr.Hauschka Rose Day Cream Evolve Hyaluronic Acid Serum Weleda Skin Food John Masters Conditioner Dr Bronner`s All-One Almond Pure-Castile Soap Bar *T&C's apply. Select products as marked in-store only. No additional discounts apply. While supplies last. Quantities limited. Availability may vary by store location and type. See team member for details. Our Local Brands & Makers Loving our local artisans, makers, entrepreneurs and producers is something that just comes, well, naturally. After all, our local community is one of our most important ingredients.
